channel.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
channel.desc: Tony Hodge, who fell in love with New Zealand and Waiheke Island, is building a unique home from seven shipping containers on a challenging Rocky Bay site.

channel.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Everyday
channel.desc: Jamie transforms weekly staples into family favourites: a one-pan roast chicken with sausages and a reimagined British-style Bolognese.

channel.title: Best of The Gardener
channel.desc: This spring, Tanya shows you how to bring colour, attract wildlife, care for your lawn, harvest water, and boost biodiversity in your garden.

channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Andrea and David view a property formally inhabited by one of the Three Musketeers.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Listings
channel.desc: Bantry Bay beauty, a grand estate in Centurion, and sleek luxury on Northcliff Ridge - this episode of Luxury Listings delivers unforgettable design and views.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Bessie takes us to a modern multi-million-dollar new build. Tips and tricks for your own home and Shaun Lockyer shows off his own beach home.
